mapper.select: select * from(select rownum as rn, c.* from(select a.*, b.subhead, b.content, b.poster, b.trailer from movie a left join moviesub b on a.title = b.title where a.opendt > sysdate-30 and a.opendt <= sysdate order by opendt) c ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}

select *from(select rownum as rn, c.* from(select a.*, b.subhead, b.content, b.poster, b.trailer from movie a left join moviesub b on a.title = b.title where a.opendt > sysdate order by opendt desc) c ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
select count(*) from movie where opendt > sysdate-30 and opendt <= sysdate

select count(*) from movie where opendt > sysdate
